en.about.heading: About fikua
en.about.description: Fikua is a non-profit organization dedicated to facilitating and providing technology guidance related to self-sovereign identity and digital identity for any organization aiming to create and implement a digital identity system. The name "Fikua" is derived from the transformation of the Swahili word "fichua," which means to expose, disclose, uncover, unveil, or reveal.
